participant_1.background: i love cats and have two cats. my favorite season is winter. i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics. i've a hat collection of over 1000 hats.

participant_2.background: my ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. i'm a recording engineer and own my own studio. i prefer being inside. whats up i am a 46 year old single dad 46 a kids. i live in california but the recording artist market was dead last year.
